current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent earnings stripping of domestic corporations
			 which are members of a worldwide group of corporations which includes an
			 inverted corporation and to require agreements with respect to certain
			 related party transactions with those members.
